snapshot.comment: Alma has been doing a great job of coordinating this project. She is very proactive and this ensures that everything moves smoothly. She also performed a good hand-over of her work to the junior taking over this section with continued support when needed which also shows that she is a good team player.

I can trust Alma to get things done on time and at high quality. She understands the assignments given to her, asks questions when relevant and delivers a high quality product. I am very happy to have Alma on my team.
It is always an extreme pleasure to work with Alma and you can always trust the work performed and reviewed by her.

It has been great working with Alma and seeing her develop over the year. She is a key person on our team and carries a lot of responsibility. She also speaks up when she needs to and that is appreciated by the rest of the team. Alma is also very positive and has a good impact on our team culture. We need more Alma's at this company.

Alma has been coaching and guiding our new team members and has done an excellent job at performing a detailed review of the assistants' work. She takes pride in her work and is always eager to learn new things. I am extremely grateful to have her as a part of the team.
